summary:
I am an industrial designer conceptualising developing and managing the production of objects. Focusing on research-based collaborations across craft and high-tech industries to materialise narratives.

- About me 
     Industrial Designer 
     Design Brand Manager
     Freelance filmmaker 

I've been a multidisciplinary Industrial designer for eight years. My work began in Mumbai in building a bespoke object brand collaborating across traditional crafts and contemporary technologies. Supporting local craft collectives to realign aesthetical perceptions to produce work of lasting value. 

I believe in the power of materials to shape experiences and transform the way we interact with the world. With meticulous attention to detail and a deep understanding of the intrinsic qualities of materials, I strive to create designs that evoke emotion, challenge conventions, and inspire meaningful connections.

Now based in Europe and having recently graduated with a Geo-Design Master from Design Academy Eindhoven, my work extends beyond aesthetics, as I aim to address pressing social, environmental, and cultural issues through my designs. By collaborating with diverse industries and experts, I seek to materialize ideas that address urgencies.

In addition to my design pursuits, I also pursue freelance filmmaking, allowing me to explore visual storytelling and further enhance my creative capabilities.

awards.description:
One of five winners of an International Lighting Design Competition 

The brief for the competition:
The competition aims to create an independent luminaire which blends form & function - exploring the fine line between technical & decorative lighting to create a “Techno-decorative” luminaire which can be used across residential, commercial or institutional projects. While maintaining the emphasis on sustainable materials and crafts, the goal of the competition stresses the importance of designing a luminaire for mass production

profile_positions.description:
Design Brand Manager | Object Branch Operations | Concept Development | Production Management

During my time at Case Design, I played a pivotal role in establishing and managing the Object branch, Casegoods. As a dynamic Design Brand Manager, I oversaw a comprehensive range of responsibilities. This included designing captivating concepts for new products, meticulously managing the production process, and implementing efficient inventory strategies. Furthermore, I was actively involved in strategic planning for future development, leveraging market insights to drive growth. With my ability to blend innovative design thinking with proficient project management, I cultivated a diverse portfolio of successful products that resonated with the target audience. Skills of adaptability, collaborative spirit, and strong stakeholder relationships were instrumental in achieving results in the fast-paced design industry.

The brand is now availbe in galieries accross the world, including but not limited to, Le Mill (Ind), complete Works (Ch), Graanmarkt 13 (Be), Platform D (Nl), Mikado (Is), Deeya (Fr)
